12.15.22  6:39 am   Do you think it's funny how there are 2 r's on the side of the "Into the Redondo Sun" sign when one of the 2 characters puts it on the plaza sign?

preferably pokemon

      i thought it was rabbit ears. the purpose of that was to go along with the rabbit theme of the video

      it's fine

      would have to go underwater, across the ocean floor

     you get to decide

      in that case, maybe you belong everywhere

12.14.22  10:53 am   What are your thoughts before you sleep?

      i am usually checking some 9 digit number for prime factors. or maybe it has less digits if i've already found some and divided it down

12.14.22  9:11 am   Is the orange shirt guy lying about buying the cars in Perfect.

      i have no idea

12.14.22  8:29 am   a follow up to the spreadsheet question: what do you use spreadsheets for when you Do use them?

      i used one earlier this year to keep track of the time span of the production process for each music video, and what day i reached each of the important milestones of each project. to track my progress and compare it from project to project

12.14.22  7:13 am   what music genre do you prefer, regular or normal?

      split the difference. let's call that "middle of the road"

12.14.22  5:43 am   how come my music always sucks when i try to imitate, but when i dont try to imitate, i actually make progress

      that probably means you are original

12.14.22  12:55 am   how do I become less awkward when performing in front of others

      perform in front of others, more often

12.14.22  12:21 am   What's the 1st thing you'd check after you were frozen for 100 years?

      the temperature

12.13.22  11:58 pm   When you made the lyric "put it into words and then send it all over the world", did you ever think that someone could have misheard it as "put it into 'Wurtz'?" As in, you, the singer?

      the phonetic similarity between words and wurtz has been known to me for quite some time. it might vaguely cross my mind every time i use the word words

12.13.22  10:52 pm   how do i become sad

      get extremely happy for a prolonged period of time

12.13.22  10:22 pm   what do you think about people?

     they're pretty good

     are they wrong most of the time and that mistakes become a true things?

     not quite

12.13.22  10:08 pm   What do you do for the non-musical sound design?

      sometimes i use percussion sounds, but what i did on the juggling video was i made a checklist of all the moments in the video that needed sounds, then took a bunch of objects from around the house and brought them into the booth and tried making all the sounds i could get from them, and checking things off the list when i thought i had something that worked for each sound needed in the video. sometimes i ended up getting a sound that worked for a different bit than i thought that particular object would be used for. i also discovered that i could actually get a wide variety of different sounds just by tapping my fingers and hands together in different ways, in different proximities to the microphone. In videos since then, i haven't recorded any more sounds, i've just gone back to the recording session for the juggling video and i've been able to get whatever i need from there

12.13.22  9:05 pm   What instrument is that on "right here" and "brand new location" ? it sounds awesome

      it seems like a whole conglomorate of bass and synth, and drums

12.13.22  9:01 pm   Big fan here! quick question: how much fire do i need to melt North Dakota(to save us from another winter i mean)? I don think that i have the mental will to live through another.

      if you do that you might mess up the summer. have you thought about moving south instead

12.13.22  8:36 pm   If you had to guess, what's the ratio of melodies and ideas you have that never become fully realized to ones that are?

      never hasn't arrived yet, so i won't know until then

12.13.22  8:35 pm   is everyone more similar than different, or is everyone more different than similar? is everyone so different that we're all extremely similar?

      we are all equally different and similar
